title: Come to realize with all of these login issues.
body:
This Kalista Login music is some of the worst sh*t to come out of Riot in a while.

Seriously. The vocals just sound like random notes out of a minor scale strung together and put over a backing track.

replies.body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xpe-JoGyPsY thats been my music and background on loggin for ages lol
Well what do you expect after a great login screen?

You can disable it. 
That said, I kinda like it. It's eerie, in a way.
It's generally good, the vocals just ruin it though.
